ISSUE.TITLE: User icon and name is covering the bookmark icon in md-theme
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug We are using the md-theme. Since the upgrade to 19.0.1 the user icon and name is covering the bookmark-star-icon. So the bookmarks are no more selectable. When selecting the bookmark icon with a mouse click the user data is shown (because it is overlaying the bookmark icon). ![Bild1](https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/assets/164546990/8e04a801-b001-4dda-86fd-6b28741b6da9) ### Dolibarr Version 19.0.1 running on WIN11 ### Environment PHP 7.3.33 ### Environment Database mariadb 10.6.5 ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: FIX bad search on _ char in like when Debugbar is on
